name: remove color
content:
Removes the tint from a sprite or group of sprites.

This block removes the tint from a sprite and returns the costume to its original appearance. The block will not have an effect on a sprite whose color has not been changed.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: The ghost changes colors when it touches the paint, but the color is removed when it touches the soap.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: The sprite or sprite group whose color is being removed

short_description: Removes the tint from a sprite or group of sprites.
